title: Utopia_Ecosystem
author: Utopia_Ecosystem
content: The Utopia P2P project team is looking for regional representatives to promote the project to the inter-regional and international markets.Utopia P2P is a decentralized ecosystem, with completely anonymous registration and use, based on peer-to-peer technology. The ecosystem has built-in all the necessary tools that provide instant communication, encrypted file transfer, anonymous browsing, tools for bypassing internet blocks, and much more. The main task for applicants is a full-fledged organization of events, which includes:- Attracting a new audience to a digital product.- Forming of a correct understanding of the value of the product among the audience.- Forming a habit for daily use of the product.- Preparing forms and collecting feedback from event participants.- Creation of regional communities.- Attracting new regional representatives.We are waiting for your applications at matthew_turner@cryptohill.ioIn the topic field put "Regional Representative Application", please.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: I think you could add more information about the job, especially as to the payment that should be expected from the applicants (since this is a service board) and which regions are you most interested in.

comments.body: How's the regional rep going to promote the Utopia P2P project to inter-regional and international markets. What's the intended platform you'll ask them to use.
